attributes.action: BBC TV Licence, people should have the Right to Opt Out !!
attributes.additional_details:
BBC funding model should be changed to a subscription based model so that its viewership and funding is based on its performance, need and demand. 

It should operate in a pure democratic way and people should have a right to choose if they really want to pay the licence fees and view BBC channels or not. 

People should not be forced to pay the licence fee.
attributes.background:
As of now people are forced to pay the TV licence and cannot opt out. 

This is not a democratic way of doing things, it is more like dictatorship where everyone is forced to pay for the service irrespective of its performance or need.
